post: Dear “Thinker” Before you write something defamatory take the time to check your facts. When you have actually read what I have spent more than 20 years studying, perhaps you will be so kind as to retract your fallacious statements from a public forum. Find out the whole story before you respond in future. Remember that the world is full of people who have opinions but very few of them actually think. If you are really a “thinker” then you should know this and practice accordingly. NPLA.
title: Nicholas Allen’s Photograph Theory Just Won’t Die
